name: Aula Dark
description: Dark theme for the Aula Education Web Portal
additional_info:
Version 0.3
- First "Working" Version
- Changed feed to be dark

Version 0.2
-Fixed Chat (minor styling issues)
-Drive links still hover white (need better conditionals to bypass compiled CSS)
- Selected Submenus have light borders 
- Picking modules themed

Version 0.1
There is still a lot that is broken:
- Drive links hover are white
- Selected Submenus are light
- Chat is not touched
- Main Module slide out is not touched
